basic_info.description: üëã I am a Computer Science student, self-taught, and fluent in English, with practical experience in Artificial Intelligence and software development. My academic journey, combined with my curiosity, has led me to explore various technologies independently, always seeking to learn and apply new tools that can positively impact the world around us. I have solid skills in development with Next.js, Django, and Node.js, as well as advanced knowledge in AI techniques such as Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning, and Computer Vision. I stay up to date with the latest tech trends because I believe that innovation and continuous learning are essential for success in the IT field. I am looking for an internship opportunity where I can apply and expand my skills, collaborate with an innovative team, and contribute to creating solutions that generate real impact. I am committed to my professional growth and excited to join a team that shares the vision of driving transformation through technology.

projects.title: PLN
projects.description: The main goal of this project is to compare the performance of different word embeddings and similarity measures on both lemmatized and stemmed forms of text. By using a variety of NLP techniques, we aim to measure similarity between words and evaluate the results for NLP tasks such as text classification, information retrieval, and clustering.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!

experience.title: Developer
experience.description: jaguaracamb√© is a wild animal conservation NGO, where I had the opportunity to contribute to this initiative that I admire so much. I was responsible for building their website, as well as participating in the environmental education project they coordinate. You can see the website here: https://www.jaguaracambe.org/

experience.title: Undergraduate Research - Program for Scientific Initiation Scholarships
experience.description: I conducted research on an automatic correction system for free-text answers. The project involved analyzing existing studies in the field and implementing various similarity measurement techniques. I compared the performance of Cosine Similarity, Jaccard Index, and Word Mover's Distance using different vector space models, including Bag of Words, TF-IDF, and word embeddings.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant of Data structure
experience.description: Graded assignments and exams, and provided feedback to students. Also provided one-on-one support to students, helping them to understand and implement data structures and algorithms. Some of the topics covered: Linked lists, Stacks, Queues, Trees and graphs, Hash tables, Heaps, Time and space  complexity, Algorithmic design.
